overview.ovdesc:
CR CR.IDENTIFY.CUSTOMER CR.IDENTIFY.CUSTOMER
Application used to capture the identification details of the CUSTOMER.

desc.p: Denotes the name of the holder of the Id.
Used to check for the availability of required information about the customer.
Allowed values are None, No or Yes. Default value is None.
Denotes the address proof documentâ€™s reference.
1-20 type A (alphanumeric) characters. (Optional input. No default value.)
Denotes the type of documents that proves customer's address.
Allowed values are Official letter, Reference, Utility Bill or None. Default value is None.
Denotes the Reference no. of the identification document.
Denotes the type of documents that proves customer's Id.
Allowed values are DRIVERS.LICENCE, ID.CARD, PASSPORT or SECURITY.PASS No default value.
